# description

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the model algorithm type.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing an algorithm type

- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the algorithm type that’s suitable for output during debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the algorithm type in a playground.
